title: Unsupervised Learning
content:
Core Algorithms from CS229

  • Clustering: K-means, hierarchical clustering, mixture models
  • Dimensionality Reduction: PCA, factor analysis
  • Density Estimation: Kernel density estimation, Gaussian mixtures

Theoretical Perspectives (HUJI Book)

  • Information-Theoretic Approaches: Minimum description length
  • Generative Models: Theoretical foundations

Advanced Topics from Paper Collection

Contemporary approaches to unsupervised learning highlighted in your reading materials.

Paper collection - Recent research approaches to unsupervised learning and representation learning
